testcase.classname: US_034 As an administrator, I want the Product List page to be able to access the product lists on the site.
testcase.name: TC_3413 Verify that Product Information, Price Info And Stock, Weight Height Info, Product Image Info, Pdf Specifications, Product Video Info, Others Info information is changeable on Clone Product page
testcase.system-out: Given Go to "myUrl" page....................................................passed Then Enter a valid "Email" address and "Password" in the relevant fields on the page that opens, then click the SIGN IN button..passed Then Then a message about successful login should appear in a green box in the upper right corner of the screen..passed Then The Products Title should be clickable under the PRODUCT MANAGE title on the left side of the screen on the Dashboard page..passed Then Click on the link button titled Product Lists from the options listed under the Products Title..passed Then Click on any Select button opposite the products under the Action heading column..passed Then Click the Clone Link button............................................passed Then Click the Variant checkbox under the Product Information heading, then click the Single checkbox again to select it..passed Then Type "Exclusive Leather Bag" in the NAME text box and "ex-bag-2" in the PRODUCT SKU text box..passed Then Type "Woman Bag" in the SUBTITLE1 text box and "bg-001" in the MODEL NUMBER text box..passed Then Click on the CATEGORY text box, click on the Bags option in the mini pop-up box that appears..passed Then Click on the box under the BRAND title and select the OzVittoria brand from the options..passed Then Click on the box under the UNIT heading and click on the LOT option from the options that appear..passed Then Click on the box under the BARCODE TYPE title and click on any of the options that appear..passed Then Type "1" in the text box under the MINIMUM ORDER QTY title and "12" in the MAX ORDER QTY text box..passed Then Type "woman bags" in the text box under Tags (Comma Separated).........passed Then Click the Browse button under Product Image Info and click the Upload New button from the pop-up window..passed Then Upload an image file from your computer by clicking the Browse files link and click the Done button..passed Then Then click on the 'Sort by newest' option from the sorting options in the window that opens and select an image..passed Then Click the Select Only checkbox and click the Add Files button and save the file..passed Then Upload a PDF file from your computer by clicking the Browse button in the Upload PDF section under PDF SPECIFICATIONS..passed Then Select Youtube from the VIDEO PROVIDER box under the heading Product Video Information and print a "Youtube link" in the VIDEO LINK text box..passed Then Check that the STATUS and MAKE DISPLAY IN DETAILS PAGE selected information under Others Info can be changed..passed Then Check that the selected and written information under the Weight Height Info heading can be changed..passed Then Write a description about the product in the text boxes under the headings Description and Specifications..passed Then Type a title and description in the META TITLE and META DESCRIPTION text boxes under SEO info..passed And Then click the Save button at the bottom of the page and check that the information has been successfully saved..passed

testcase.classname: US_034 As an administrator, I want the Product List page to be able to access the product lists on the site.
testcase.name: TC_3414 On the Save button, it should be verified that the message reminding that the information on the Related Product, Up Sale, Cross Sale pages must be filled before registration is visible.

failure.message: The scenario has pending or undefined step(s)

testcase.failure: Given Go to "myUrl" page....................................................passed Then Enter a valid "Email" address and "Password" in the relevant fields on the page that opens, then click the SIGN IN button..passed Then Then a message about successful login should appear in a green box in the upper right corner of the screen..passed Then The Products Title should be clickable under the PRODUCT MANAGE title on the left side of the screen on the Dashboard page..passed Then Click on the link button titled Product Lists from the options listed under the Products Title..passed Then Click on any Select button opposite the products under the Action heading column..passed Then Click the Clone Link button............................................passed Then With the GENERAL INFORMATION window tab selected, verify that the message reminding that the information must be filled before recording is displayed at the end of the page..undefined Then Click on the RELATED PRODUCT tab, verify that the Related Product window appears at the end of the page reminding you to fill in the information before recording..skipped Then Click on the UP SALE tab, verify that the Up Sale window appears at the end of the page, reminding that the information must be filled before registration..skipped Then Click on the CROSS SALE tab, verify that the Cross sale window appears at the end of the page, reminding that the information must be filled before registration..skipped
